articles.title: Australian police say Bondi Beach mass shooting was terrorist attack inspired by Islamic State group - PBS
articles.description: Authorities have identified the suspects as a father, who was killed, and son, who is hospitalized.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) A mass shooting in which 15 people were killed during a Hanukkah celebration at Sydney’s Bondi Beach was “a terrorist attack inspired by Islamic State,” Australia’s federal … [+7804 chars]
